doc.field: This subseries contains files from CDs and DVDs received from the donor. The content consists primarily of records related to fundraising and publicity, as well as records of routine business operations and file backups. Represented events include Miracle Paddle, Cocktails by the Bay, the Diversity Players of Harlem health fair, Miracle House Mid and Year-End Appeals, and Tea-quila! Party, a fundraiser held in Pines, Fire Island and referred to as Pines throughout the collection. Documents include numerous photos, flyers, press releases, mailers, graphics files for flyers, sponsor forms, spreadsheets of expenses, letters to donors and other marketing materials.

138 discs were received, but 22 discs were not imaged because they were either duplicates or contained copyrighted music. 116 discs were imaged to the ISO format and files were exported from the disk images. The discs were received in one wallet and some loose in one box. Each disc was numbered based on the order starting with the discs in the wallet, and any title or information written on the discs was transcribed to the filename. Each entry in this series represents one disc.
Series I. Digital Files >> Subseries I.B: CDs and DVDs, 1991-2013
